xuse:stakeholder.xuse:title: Vendor

xuse:stakeholder.xuse:title: Service Management
xuse:stakeholder.xuse:description: Service management will run and administer the system from an operational perspective.

xuse:stakeholder.xuse:title: Security
xuse:stakeholder.xuse:description: The department responsible for ensuring security of the application and application data.

xuse:stakeholder.xuse:title: Marketing
xuse:stakeholder.xuse:description: The marketing department. The marketing department not only have a say in how the product should look and feel, how it should be portrayed, but they are also very keen that certain aspects of the product (such as usability and security) do not detract from the product's reputation.

xuse:stakeholder.xuse:title: Corporate Management
xuse:stakeholder.xuse:description: The business leaders in . They have a vested interest that is delivers improved functionality and streamlines the sales ordering process.
